revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__

=Description=
Raffles are regularly held competitions which provide the player base with an opportunity to win exclusive and high-end prizes. Depending on the raffle, you will be able to purchase tickets with [[Donation Coin|donation coins]] and/or gold.

[[File:pastraffle.png|200px|right]]Past prizes have included:
* [[House_Decay#Ageless_Houses|Ageless Houses]]
* Item Bless Deeds
* Fully levelled [[Meta Talismans|Meta Mage Talisman]]
* 120 Animal Taming [[Power_Scrolls|powerscroll]]

==How to buy tickets==
Type "[Raffles" in game to bring up the raffles gump. This will tell you if there is currently a raffle running:
[[File:rafflescreen.png|200px|center]]

You can also load up the raffles gump by double-clicking the special vendor Aleron who can be found on the south west corner of West Britain Bank:
[[File:rafflewheretobuy.png|200px|center]]

Good luck!
